name: Profanitorium
description:
Do you like Tetris? Do you like Dr. Mario? Do you like swearing? Well, you're in the right place. 

Grab a friend, a partner, a loved one, or maybe even an enemy and go into the not-so-frantic race of building swear words from those seemly random set of falling letters. Once you've put together something offensive, slam that attack button and sling that utter profanity to your opponent to mess up their day. 

"What's the point of all this?" you might ask. 

WHO CARES?! It's holiday. 

Made in 48-ish hours for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019. Inspired by the theme "Cursemas Eve".

Achievements

  • Tripod - The team size is 3.
